text_display_data.content:
## `📝` Changelog - v0.1.4
*Updated on 2025/05/22*

### `🚀` New Features
- **Referral System** has been added.
  - Use the `/referral` command to access the Referral Panel.
  - Invite your friends to play the bot and have them use your referral code. 
  - Both of you will receive **200 coins** and **5 gems** for each friend who captures at least 5 Animons after using your code.
  - Additionally, you'll earn **10%** of all gems purchased by your referred friends.
- The `/changelog` command has been added.

### `🐛` Bug Fixes

- Fixed issues related to using items on Animons.
